document.full_text: credit ratings agencies hammered greece on monday after senior euro zone policymakers acknowledged that athens will need a second bailout package soon to avert a disorderly overhaul of its debt obligations.
document.title: ratings agencies hammer greece in eu chaos
lines_and_colors: credit ratings agencies hammered greece on monday after senior euro zone policymakers acknowledged that athens will need a second bailout package soon to avert a disorderly overhaul of its debt obligations.
